description: Moto G56 5G has leaked several times previously. Unofficially, we have seen the design, colour options and key features of the purported handset. It is expected to launch in select global markets soon. A new report claims that Motorola accidentally listed the anticipated Moto G56 5G on some regional official sites.
title: Moto G56 5G Specifications Reportedly Listed on Company's Websites Ahead of Global Launch

description: OnePlus AI brand was unveiled by the company on Tuesday as the new artificial intelligence (AI) suite for its devices. The consumer tech brand also revealed the functionalities of the Plus Key, which is confirmed to first feature on the upcoming OnePlus 13s. The hardware button can be used for several different utility features as well as to activate a couple of AI tools.
title: OnePlus 13s to Arrive With Support for OnePlus AI Suite; Plus Key Details Revealed Ahead of Launch

description: OnePlus Ace 5 Ultra has been launched in China with a MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ chipset, alongside the OnePlus Ace 5 Racing Edition. The latter is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 9400e SoC. They run on Android 15-based ColorOS 15 out-of-the-box. Both phones are equipped with a "Glacier" cooling system for thermal management. They carry in-display optical fingerprint sensors for biometric authentication.
title: OnePlus Ace 5 Ultra With MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC Launched Alongside Ace 5 Racing Edition

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge was introduced earlier this month as the thinnest Galaxy S series phone yet. Now, the company has initiated early deliveries of the Galaxy S25 Edge in India for customers who pre-ordered the device. The pre-orders are confirmed to be open until May 30. Customers who pre-order the new Galaxy S25 series phone will get a free storage upgrade worth Rs. 12,000.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Begins Shipping to Customers During Pre-Order Window: Price, Specifications

description: WhatsApp is reportedly developing a unified media browser for WhatsApp Web, aiming to simplify viewing and managing sent and received media. This feature, currently in development, will offer WhatsApp Web users a centralised location for all media, similar to the existing functionality on WhatsApp for Android and iOS.
title: WhatsApp Reportedly Developing Unified Chat Media Hub Feature for Web Client

description: Xiaomi unveiled its Mix Flip in July last year. Now, the Chinese tech brand seems to be readying the Xiaomi Mix Flip 2 as a possible successor. Ahead of the official confirmation, a chinese tipster has leaked the launch timeline of the phone. The upcoming clamshell foldable smartphone is expected to run on the Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC. The Xiaomi Mix Flip 2 is likely to feature a 6.85-inch inner display and a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit.
title: Xiaomi Mix Flip 2 Launch Timeline Leaked; Tipped to Arrive With Snapdragon 8 Elite Chipset

description: Oppo Reno 14 series India launch could happen very soon. The Chinese tech brand has not confirmed the launch date of Reno 14 and Reno 14 Pro in the country, but a new leaks suggest that they will go official in July. The leak includes an alleged live shot of the Indian variant of the Oppo Reno 14. The Reno 14 series was launched in China earlier this month with MediaTek Dimensity chipsets, 50-megapixel main cameras and 50-megapixel selfie shooters. They support 80W wired fast charging.
title: Oppo Reno 14, Reno 14 Pro India Launch Timeline and Colourways Leaked

description: Elon Musk has revealed that the X Money service will undergo a limited beta testing before being launched. This X Money platform is expected to debut later this year with support for crypto transactions, especially those being facilitated through Bitcoin.
title: Elon Musk Says X Money Payments Will Launch in 'Very Limited Access Beta' Soon

description: Dubai has launched pilot trials for real estate tokenisation this week. During the trial phase, all transactions will be conducted exclusively in Dirhams, with cryptocurrencies temporarily excluded from the process.
title: Dubai's Real Estate Tokenisation Pilot Goes Live on Dedicated Platform Prypco Mint: Details

description: Astronomers are harnessing quantum mechanics to build a coronagraph that could directly image Earth-like exoplanets previously obscured by stellar glare. By sorting light waves at the photon level, the device bypasses traditional diffraction limits, revealing faint planetary signals. This breakthrough may redefine how scientists explore distant worlds and aid missions like NASA’s Habitable Worlds Observatory.
title: Quantum Tech Could Finally Let Astronomers Snap Direct Images of Earth-Like Exoplanets

description: Two Homo erectus skull fragments recovered from the seafloor near Java have rewritten the species' migration story. Once thought isolated to Java, H. erectus likely roamed the now-submerged plains of Sundaland 140,000 years ago. These ancient humans hunted turtles and large mammals and may have adopted modern hunting techniques, possibly through cultural exchange with Neanderthals or Denisovans. This discovery, detailed in studies led by archaeologist Harold Berghuis, reveals how glacial-era land bridges shaped early human evolution in Southeast Asia.
title: New Homo Erectus Fossils Reveal Ancient Migration Across Drowned Sundaland

description: An international team of astronomers has detected a peculiar fast-evolving X-ray transient, EP241021a, using China’s Einstein Probe. Unveiled in a May 12 arXiv paper, this transient stood out due to its long-lasting emissions lasting over 79 days—unprecedented among FEXTs. EP241021a also produced optical and radio emissions, suggesting a multi-component structure. Scientists believe the source may be a magnetar engine or a jetted tidal disruption event (TDE), although neither theory fully explains the observation. This groundbreaking discovery could transform our understanding of rare, energetic cosmic explosions
title: Einstein Probe Detects Mysterious X-ray Flare with Record-Long Emission

description: A 2025 study reveals Jupiter was once twice its current size with 50x stronger magnetism. Using moon orbits for data, researchers show how early Jupiter shaped the solar system’s structure.
title: Jupiter Was Once Twice as Big With 50x Stronger Magnetism, Says New Study

description: Axiom Space’s Ax-4 mission is set to launch June 8 aboard a SpaceX Falcon 9, carrying astronauts from India, Poland, and Hungary to the ISS. Led by veteran astronaut Peggy Whitson, the 14-day mission will feature over 60 experiments from 31 countries, advancing global research and paving the way for Axiom’s future private space station
title: Axiom’s Ax-4 Private Space Mission to ISS Cleared for June 8 Launch via SpaceX

description: Kapil Sharma lights up Netflix again with The Great Indian Kapil Show Season 3, premiering June 21, 2025. Watch every Saturday at 8 PM IST for unmatched comedy, celebrity glamour, and fan-powered moments that make this season extra special!
title: The Great Indian Kapil Show Season 3 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Stolen is a story of two brothers who witness a woman stealing a baby at a railway station. That one evening changes everything for them, too. One entirely led by my moral duty convinces his brother to help the mother find her child; what follows next is an eye opener for the viewers as it shows the societal norms and flaws in the institutional law, which leaves everyone with questions.
title: Abhishek Banerjee’s Stolen OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Brace yourself for a psychological rollercoaster as Kankhajura drops on SonyLIV on May 30. Mohit Raina and Roshan Mathew lead a story of guilt, secrets, and estranged brothers. With a story set in Goa, the series dives deep into family secrets, trauma, and redemption. It is an official adaptation of Magpie
title: Kankhajura OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Psychological Thriller Online?

description: Directed by Hosimin, Sumo is a Tamil comedy movie that stars Shiva and Priya Anand in the lead roles. The story follows a lost sumo wrestler who has been found on an Indian beach by the locals. As he befriends Shiva, that's where the story takes a turn. Shiva pledges to return him safely to Japan. Streaming Now on Sun NXT.
title: Sumo Streaming Now Aha Tamil: Everything You Need to Know About Tamil Comedy

description: Season 2 of Nine Perfect Strangers has arrived with Nicole Kidman back as Masha. Set in a remote Alpine retreat, the story explores healing, mystery, and psychological depth. Now streaming on Prime Video India with weekly episodes, the show is building buzz for its intense narrative and ensemble cast.
title: Nine Perfect Strangers S2 Now Streaming on Prime Video: What You Need to Know About  Nicole Kidman's Starrer Series

description: Oppo Find X9 Ultra is expected to arrive as a successor to the Oppo Find X8 Ultra, which was unveiled in China in April this year. A recent leak has hinted at the probable camera specifications of the purported smartphone. It may come with four rear cameras, including two periscope shooters. The Oppo Find X9 lineup has previously been tipped to come with four smartphones.
title: Oppo Find X9 Ultra Tipped to Debut With 200-Megapixel Periscope Telephoto Camera

description: ByteDance released a new multimodal artificial intelligence (AI) model last week. Dubbed Bagel, it is a visual language model (VLM), which is capable of image understanding, generation, and editing. The Beijing-based tech giant has open-sourced the model, and it is available to download via popular AI repositories such as GitHub and Hugging Face.
title: ByteDance Unveils Bagel Open Source Multimodal AI Model With Support for Generating, Editing Images

description: Bharti Airtel has announced new OTT recharge plans for prepaid customers in India on Tuesday. The new recharge plans offer access to more than 25 streaming platforms. The entry-level plan costs Rs. 279 and offers a one-month validity. It offers access to leading OTT platforms including Netflix, JioHotstar, Zee5, and SonyLiv. The telecom company has also announced entertainment packs priced at Rs. 598 and Rs. 1,729 with a validity of 28 days and 84 days, respectively.
title: Airtel Announces New All-in-One OTT Packs for Prepaid Customers Starting at Rs. 279

description: Realme GT 7, Realme GT 7T, and Realme GT 7 Dream Edition were launched in India and global markets on Tuesday. The new phones come with MediaTek Dimensity chipsets and carry 7,000mAh battery units with 120W charging support. The Realme GT 7 has a triple rear camera setup, while the Realme GT 7T gets a dual rear camera unit. The Realme GT 7 Dream Edition is a special edition smartphone launched in association with Aston Martin's F1 Team.
title: Realme GT 7, GT 7 Dream Edition and Realme GT 7T With 7,000mAh Batteries Launched in India

description: A native WhatsApp app for the iPad is said to be in the works. The Meta-owned instant messaging client appears to have teased the arrival of WhatsApp for iPad on a social media platform. For years, WhatsApp has been reported to be developing a new app that works natively on Apple’s tablet, however, it is yet to see the light of day. While a beta version has been offered to users under the company’s TestFlight programme, the public release has not happened yet.
title: WhatsApp’s Native iPad App Could See a Release Soon

description: Realme Buds Air 7 Pro TWS earphones were launched in India and select global markets on Tuesday. They are claimed to offer a playback time of up to 48 hours on a single charge, together with the case. The headsets support up to 53dB active noise cancellation (ANC) and up to 45ms low latency mode. The Buds Air 7 Pro come with support for AI features like AI Live Translator, Face to Face Translator, and AI Inquiry.
title: Realme Buds Air 7 Pro With ANC, Up to 48 Hours of Total Battery Life Launched in India: Price, Features

description: Samsung Electronics is reportedly developing a new glass substrate for advanced semiconductor packaging. Due to ever-increasing demand for AI chips, the South Korean firm is exploring the use of glass interposers instead of silicon interposers, to cut manufacturing costs and boost performance. Samsung is reportedly focusing on smaller panel prototypes, prioritising an early market launch over initial production efficiency for these next generation AI chips.
title: Samsung Reportedly Plans to Replace Silicon With Glass Interposers for Advanced AI Chips by 2028

description: OpenAI’s o3 artificial intelligence (AI) model is said to have bypassed instructions to shut down during an experiment. As per the researchers, the AI model made sabotage attempts to refuse being shut down despite being specifically instructed to do so. The experiment also included OpenAI’s Codex-mini and o4-mini, as well as Gemini 2.5 Pro and Claude 3.7 Sonnet models.
title: OpenAI o3 AI Model Bypasses Shutdown Commands in Experiment, Say Researchers

description: Alcatel has unveiled the V3 5G series of smartphones in India. The lineup includes the V3 Classic, a V3 Pro, and the V3 Ultra. The Pro and Ultra models are equipped with TCL's proprietary NXTPAPER display technology, that is claimed to reduce eye strain compared to standard LCD panels. The phones are powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC paired with up to 8GB of LPDDR4X RAM.
title: Alcatel V3 Classic 5G, V3 Pro 5G, V3 Ultra 5G Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Sony is reportedly set to announce a discount on PS5 prices as part of its Days of Play promotion. The annual event, which usually takes place around the end of May, will bring discounts on PlayStation consoles, games, and accessories.
title: Sony Tipped to Announce PS5 and PS5 Pro Discounts in Upcoming Days of Play Promotion

description: Samsung recently released a software update for the Galaxy A56 5G which brought quick access to Gemini — Google artificial intelligence (AI) assistant — via the side button. While this functionality was aimed at enhancing productivity, it is said to have left many devices unable to be used at all. Samsung Galaxy A56 5G users have reported bootloop issues after updating to the latest One UI 7 version with the handset getting stuck on the boot-up screen, although a quick fix seems to resolve the issue.
title: Samsung Galaxy A56 5G Users Report Bootloop Issues After Latest One UI 7 Update

description: Google is reportedly making it easier to select and share parts of Gemini’s responses. As per the report, Google is working on adding a quality-of-life improvement to its artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot that will allow users to directly long-press and drag to select specific portions of text and quickly share it with other apps.
title: Google Gemini to Reportedly Add Simpler Reply Selection and Sharing Feature

description: Apple's upcoming iPhone 17 series will reportedly feature a redesigned rear camera module, according to a tipster who claims the successors to the iPhone 17 lineup will also arrive with significant design changes. Apple is said to be working on a full-screen iPhone with an under-display camera, and the launch timeline for such a smartphone has now been leaked.
title: Apple Planning Extensive iPhone Redesigns Over Next Three Years, Tipster Claims

description: Samsung Galaxy A56 was launched in March with the company's in-house Exynos 1580 chipset. Now, Samsung appears to have started working on its successor, the Galaxy A57. While the phone is not expected to arrive until next year, details about the chipset of the phone are emerging online. It is said to come with a new Exynos processor with Xclipse GPU.
title: Samsung Galaxy A57 Will Reportedly Be Powered by New Exynos Chipset

description: Moto G96 5G is expected to launch later this year. Ahead of official details, the expected price and key specifications of the purported handset have been leaked. The phone is tipped to be a mid-range offering equipped with a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chipset and a 5,500mAh battery. A report has suggested that the Moto G96 5G may be available in four Pantone-based colour options on launch.
title: Moto G96 5G Price, Colour Options Leaked; Key Features Surface Online

description: Hisense is said to be gearing up to introduce a new QLED TV with gaming-centric features soon. According to a report, the Hisense E7Q Pro QLED TV will be launched in India this week. The QLED TV is expected to come with features which cater to gamers, including a 144Hz refresh rate, AMD FreeSync Premium technology, and a Game Bar interface. It might be available in sizes ranging from 55 inches to a whopping 100 inches.
title: Hisense E7Q Pro QLED TV With 144Hz Refresh Rate to Launch in India This Week: Report

description: Samsung is said to be working on One UI 8, its next iteration of the Android operating system based on Android 16. While the rumour mill has provided some information about the Android skin so far, a tipster suggests that the South Korean technology conglomerate could revamp the built-in Reminder app with the One UI 8 update.
title: Samsung's One UI 8 Update Tipped to Get Revamped Reminder App With New UI Elements

description: Acer Super ZX sale In India commenced on Monday, but the Super ZX Pro availability is still unknown. The phones made their debut in April and at the time, the company promised their availability approximately 10 days later, however, that did not come to fruition. More than a month after its debut, the base Acer Super ZX is now available for purchase in the country. It sports an LCD screen and is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC.
title: Acer Super ZX Now Available for Purchase in India; Super ZX Pro Still Unavailable
